name: Go Bang
description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.

key_work.title: Go Bang – PNAU
key_work.brief_description: Australian dance act PNAU are celebrated for groundbreaking visuals in their live act and music videos, including for their single Go Bang (2017) which featured Kira Divine. The clip creates a psychedelic, cosmic journey through animation, the glow-in-the-dark effects and an aquatic aesthetic.

constellations_primary.name: Go Bang
constellations_primary.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.

end.title: Moana
end.creator_credit: John Musker, Ron Clements, Chris Williams, Don Hall, Osnat Shurer, Hurwitz Creative, Walt Disney Animation Studios and Lisa Keane
end.brief_description: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by Maui reaches an impetuous Chieftain’s daughter’s island, she answers the Ocean’s call to seek out the demigod to set things right.

constellations_other.name: Little J & Big Cuz to Blade
constellations_other.description: Discover how some of the best indigenous works connect to comic book blockbusters and martial arts videogames.

constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.

constellations_other.name: Transfiguration
constellations_other.description: Transfiguration follows the cycle of evolution through a figure who transforms through the elements, from lava and rock to diamonds and steam. Creatures born from the elements have long been part of screen culture.

links.description: A top 10 hit for PNAU, the video for ‘Go Bang’ continued the act’s reputation for pushing boundaries. The glow-in-the-dark effects and aquatic aesthetic are not dissimilar to the introduction of Tamatoa in Moana .

end.title: Avatar 2
end.creator_credit: James Cameron, Deborah Lynn Scott, Jon Landau, 20th Century Studios, Lightstorm Entertainment, River Road Entertainment, TSG Entertainment, Ben Procter, Dylan Cole, Josh Friedman, Brian Adler, Daniel McGraw, Joe Howes and Shane Salerno
end.brief_description: Twelve years after exploring Pandora and joining the Na’vi, Jake Sully has since raised a family with Neytiri and established himself within the clans of the new world. Of course, peace can only last so long. Especially when the military organization from the original film returns to “finish what they started”.

constellations_other.name: Go Bang
constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.

links.description: In the animated Disney film Moana, the plot is an amalgamation of traditional Polynesian myths and legends. Jemaine Clement voices Tamatoa, whose musical number is evocative of a scene within the world of Pandora which Clement shall appear in for Avatar 2 .

start.title: Avatar 2

end.title: Aliens of the Deep
end.creator_credit: James Cameron, Steven Quale, Andrew Wight, Walden Media and Walt Disney Pictures
end.brief_description: James Cameron teams up with NASA scientists to explore the Mid-Ocean Ridge, a submerged chain of mountains that band the Earth and are home to some of the planet’s most unique life forms.

constellations_other.name: Go Bang
constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.

links.description: James Cameron’s intergalactic nature parable Avatar is set to continue with the sequel, Avatar 2 . The look for the world was inspired by the filmmaker’s fascination with deep sea exploring like what was documented in Aliens of the Deep.

start.title: Aliens of the Deep

end.title: Aliens
end.creator_credit: James Cameron, Emma Porteous, Gale Anne Hurd, 20th Century Fox, Brandywine Productions, SLM Production Group, Peter Lamont, David Giler and Walter Hill
end.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1986
end.brief_description: When Ripley’s lifepod is found by a salvage crew over 50 years later, she finds that terra-formers are on the very planet they found the alien species. When the company sends a family of colonists out to investigate her story—all contact is lost with the planet and colonists. They enlist Ripley and the colonial marines to return and search for answers.

constellations_other.name: Go Bang
constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.

links.description: Both in space and under sea, James Cameron has worked extensively with NASA like he did in his documentary Aliens of the Deep which was shot for IMAX. This relationship first started during research for his film Aliens .

start.title: Aliens
start.creator_credit: James Cameron, Emma Porteous, Gale Anne Hurd, 20th Century Fox, Brandywine Productions, SLM Production Group, Peter Lamont, David Giler and Walter Hill

When the company sends a family of colonists out to investigate her story—all contact is lost with the planet and colonists. They enlist Ripley and the colonial marines to return and search for answers.

end.title: Near Dark
end.creator_credit: Kathryn Bigelow, Joseph A. Porro, Steven-Charles Jaffe, DEG, F/M, Near Dark Joint Venture, Stephen Altman and Eric Red
end.brief_description: A farm boy reluctantly becomes a member of the undead when a girl he meets turns out to be part of a band of vampires who roam the highways in stolen cars.

constellations_other.name: Go Bang
constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.

links.description: The sequel to Ridley Scott’s 1979 classic, Aliens follows a ragtag group of space mercenaries as they’re deployed to battle the deadly xenomorphs. Among them is Vasquez, played by Jenette Goldstein who also appeared in Near Dark .

end.title: True Lies
end.creator_credit: James Cameron, Marlene Stewart, Stephanie Austin, 20th Century Fox, Lightstorm Entertainment, Peter Lamont, Claude Zidi, Didier Kaminka and Simon Michaël
end.brief_description: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

constellations_other.name: Go Bang
constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.

links.description: Filmmaker Kathryn Bigelow was married to James Cameron during the making of her vampire western Near Dark and they frequently shared performers, such as Jenette Goldstein and Bill Paxton who also popped up in True Lies.
